HomePage.title: REST & GraphiQL
HomePage.subtitle: Light-weight versions of Postman and GraphiQL combined in one app
HomePage.description: The application combines lightweight versions of Postman and GraphiQL into a unified API testing platform, offering method selection, headers management, request editing, and response handling. Key features include Firebase-based user authentication, a history page to track and restore past queries, and multi-language support. Errors such as unhandled rejections and network timeouts are presented in a user-friendly format, while valid HTTP error codes (4xx/5xx) appear in the response section. This project is the final task of the

FeaturesSection.feature1: Efficient API testing with customizable methods, headers, and response analysis.
FeaturesSection.feature2: Seamless query editing, documentation exploration, and response inspection.
FeaturesSection.feature3: Track, restore, and manage previously executed API requests with ease.
